hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Dodongo's Cavern#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that Mido is easily confused by sick flips.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #an Odd Mushroom# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #the Megaton Hammer#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right
